channel.title: How do i make a compiler and runner?
channel.description:
okay so im editing a client and it started off with only class files no compiler and no runner and no java files ive got all the java files (decompiler) but how do i make a compiler and runner?
EDIT: btw it was a jar file thats how it was ran ;)
